name: The Watson Premium HaLong Hotel
address: Lô 9 Đường Hoàng Quốc Việt , Khu du lịch và đô thị mới Hùng Thắng, Phường Bãi Cháy, Hạ Long, Việt Nam
description:
The Watson Premium HaLong Hotel có hồ bơi ngoài trời, trung tâm thể dục, khu vườn và phòng chờ chung ở Hạ Long. Mỗi phòng tại khách sạn 5 sao này đều nhìn ra thành phố, đồng thời khách có thể sử dụng sân hiên và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp câu lạc bộ trẻ em, dịch vụ phòng và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Tất cả các căn tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình cáp, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi sen, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Tất cả các phòng đều có ấm đun nước, trong đó một số phòng có ban công và một số khác thì nhìn ra biển. Phòng khách đều có tủ lạnh.

Tại The Watson Premium HaLong Hotel, khách sẽ tìm thấy nhà hàng phục vụ ẩm thực hải sản, Việt và địa phương. Bên cạnh đó, họ có thể yêu cầu món chay, không chứa sữa và đồ ăn Halal.

Thành thạo tiếng Anh và tiếng Việt, đội ngũ nhân viên tại lễ tân luôn sẵn lòng hỗ trợ khách vào bất kỳ thời điểm nào trong ngày.

Chỗ nghỉ cách Bãi Cháy 19 phút đi bộ và Bãi biển Marina Bay 1.8 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách The Watson Premium HaLong Hotel 40 km.

review.comment_positive:
Modernes Hotel. Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Sicht auf die Bucht. Sehr gute Mitarbeiter an der Rezeption. Uns haben 2-3 Mitarbeiter an der Rezeption spontan und sehr gut geholfen (u.a. ein Mr. Le, hoffentlich stimmt die Schreibweise).
Gute Betten. Schöner, aber etwas kalter Pool auf dem Dach. Zu einem Ablegehafen von Cruises waren es entspannte 15 min mit dem Taxi.
review.comment_negative: Wir haben uns wohlgefühlt, aber da es ein großes Hotel ist, war das Frühstück schon eine Massenabfertigung. Wir waren in der Umgebung nicht zu Fuss unterwegs und können daher die Lage nicht beurteilen.

review.comment_positive: Couldn't fault this hotel, had originally booked in for 1 night but extended to 3 nights. It's extremely quiet here. We went for dinner one evening and were the only people in the whole restaurant over the hour 7-8pm. There isn't much to do in the area. Pool area at the top is really nice and staff are very friendly. Rooms were clean. Only odd thing is that there were nearly more staff than staying in the people in the hotel which is probably reflective of the time of year. It was great for us though as service was so quick as was the WiFi 😁 Shower was great, nice selection for breakfast too.
review.comment_negative: Food in the restaurant was fine, a little bland but exactly what we needed having got food poisoning somewhere else a couple of days previous.

review.comment_positive: This hotel is clean, new, pretty, with really welcoming staff, high quality rooms and good breakfast. Ideal if you are looking for a place to stay in Ha Long. You can book your rides to Ha Long cruise terminal, Hanoi, Ninh Binh or other destinations directly with them at a good price. The swimming pool is awesome and there are many restaurants around the hotel.

Hotel is clearly new and furniture and decorations are reflective of this.
Although location is slightly out of main centre, you can easily pick up a taxi and get in within 5 mins.
review.comment_negative:
A few things that fell short of a 5 star hotel:
- Pool area ran out of towels one morning by 11am and we were told to bring towels from our room. They did eventually sort the problem but not appropriate for a 5 star hotel
- Hotel info states downstairs cafe serves cakes and pastries however on visiting they seemed to have none.
- Balconies NEED some chairs to enjoy the view. Even cheap ones! 
- I accidentally smashed a glass in the room and they charged me for it. The charge was trivial, but I feel when I had already paid quite a substantial amount for the room it was a bit harsh and unnecessary.

review.comment_positive:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Watson Premium Halong Hotel, and I must say, it exceeded all my expectations. The experience began with a delightful breakfast spread that catered to every palate, offering a perfect start to the day.

One of the highlights of my stay was the rooftop bar, where I savored exquisite cocktails while enjoying breathtaking views of the city below. The ambiance was elegant, and the service impeccable.

Moreover, the rooftop pool was a serene oasis amidst the hustle and bustle of the city. I spent hours relaxing by the poolside, soaking in the sun and indulging in the tranquil atmosphere.

But what truly stole my heart was the sea view from my room's huge balcony. Waking up to the sight of the shimmering waters was simply magical, and I found myself spending countless moments gazing out at the horizon.

Overall, Watson Premium Halong Hotel offers a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. Whether you're looking for a delicious breakfast, a vibrant rooftop experience, or stunning sea views, this hotel has it all. I cannot recommend it highly enough for an unforgettable stay in Halong.

1) Khách sạn mới và sạch sẽ.
2) Bãi đỗ xe rộng rãi và có nhân viên trông giữ cẩn thận nhiệt tình.

2) Bãi đỗ xe không có mái che. Ngoài ra, lối bãi đỗ xe đi bộ vào khác sạn là chung với đường vận chuyển hàng hóa nên rất lích kích, có mùi, và tạo cảm giác không sạch sẽ. 
3) Sáng 17.07 gia đình tôi có đi ra ngoài lúc 10h, có bật đèn "Please Clean Up," sau đó có gợi nhắc trực tiếp lễ tân để báo dọn phòng trước buổi trưa, nhưng 13h về tới nơi vẫn chưa có người dọn. 
4) Bộ phận dọn phòng lúc khoảng 16h ngày 17.07 gõ cửa để hỏi dọn phòng trong khi tôi đã để đèn báo "Do Not Disturb."

review.comment_negative:
Check in: mình đến khách sạn lúc 14h chiều nhưng sảnh chờ check in rất đông và lộn xộn, rất nhiều đoàn khách đến nhưng phòng chưa sẵn sàng. Mình đợi đến 14h30 mới được nhận phòng.

Check out: mình gọi xuống lễ tân hỏi thì lễ tân báo 11h check out( rất khó hiểu vì giờ check-out sớm nhưng check-in lại chưa có phòng, tiêu chuẩn 5sao cá nhân mình đánh giá chưa tương xứng)

Thang máy: thang chậm, do khách đông nên đợi thang cũng tương đối lâu và không có điều hoà trong thang máy cũng gây khó chịu.

Buffet sáng: hơi ít lựa chọn. 

Bãi xe ô tô: bãi xe ngoài trời không có mái che, nhân viên trông xe lúc thấy lúc không, cũng không thấy hỏi han thông tin khách lưu trú (không biết nếu xảy ra vấn đề ngoài ý muốn thì ksan xử lý ntn). 

Bên cạnh đó 1 điều nhỏ nữa mình chưa thích đó là khách sạn chỉ cấp cho khách 1 thẻ phòng ( đi ra ngoài phải rút thẻ, phòng mất điện, hơi bất tiện)

review.rating: Excellent value and would recommend to family and value mindset customers.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Premier Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
We liked many things about this property, it’s tough to name them all.

- New, clean, large rooms.  Even the bathrooms used Grohe hardware which is rare in boutique properties. 

- Gorgeous lobby, thoughtfully and tastefully designed for airy sophisticated feel (rooms also). Excellent view of HLB islet and sunset

- Nice breakfast spread with regional and continental choices that are tasty. strong coffee

- Excellent front desk staff, spoke good English. Very accommodating, readily helped with luggage and taxis, provided umbrellas for all day use, etc. Other staffs had limited to no English but wasn’t a problem for us

- Location was not in main central area of HLB but in a newer developing area. lots of new / newer buildings, resorts in vicinity.  we prefer to be in the newer area so it worked for us. was able to walk to a couple of great eateries nearby

- on-site spa was reasonably priced and new clean facilities. not the best services but good value and great way to support the local economy
review.comment_negative: For me, everything was great.  If nit-picking, the pool was a bit crowded and tad small for the size of the hotel.  However, the view of the islets from infinity pool with no other building obstructions is priceless.

review.rating: 爛死了，貴的沒道理！我在Google maps有寫評論
review.room_type: Suite Hạng Tổng Thống
review.comment_positive: 大廳開門及拿行李的服務員
review.comment_negative:
這間請pass
別相信花錢買的評論

我們住兩晚總統套房
超級爛👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽
奉勸各位有錢別來當盤子

房間在24樓
25樓是sky bar 跟泳池
隔音不好23：00以前可以聽得到樓上音樂
23：00之後各種機器設備異音、泳池馬達聲會吵到無法入睡
聲音很像一直有人在敲門（沒有固定頻率）

第一天晚上半夜三點請房務上來聽
房務當下請了工程師一起來聽
聽完就走了
然後就沒有然後了

⚠️第二天早餐
只能說得上能吃但難吃
（第三天早餐我們沒吃）
食物很敷衍
食物的牌子好幾個都放錯
服務滿隨便
進去隨便找位子坐也不會有人檢查早餐卷喔！

吃早餐的時候左右兩桌坐了飯店主管（態度都很傲慢）也在吃早餐
其中一位就是第一張影片右邊那位

第二天早上到櫃檯想去了解一下
怎麽處理有關噪音這件事
因為還是一直有摳摳摳跟各種馬達聲
左邊女會講中文的前台經理
只是回：有嗎？真的？
（幹怎麽會讓這麼不專業的溝通當前台經理）
請她先去查詢房務記錄
甚至兩個員工都來房間也聽到噪音
還懷疑我撞鬼是不是？
有詢問是否能換房間？
但因為我們趕時間跟他們說我們先出門
請討論好給我們回覆

🍇葡萄發霉事件：
葡萄是第一晚上21：00入住的時候就送的
我們一直都沒有打開
直到第二天17：00
朋友已經吃了才看到發霉
（正常來說都在冷氣房應該不至於這麼快就發霉）
打電話到客房服務
他們請一個聽不懂英文也聽不懂中文的人來看
那位先生收走發霉的葡萄
然後也沒有後續！！！

🧻衛生紙的故事
第二天是有請房務來整理房間的
但衛生紙沒補
晚上衛生紙用完請他們再拿衛生紙過來
房務拿這半包開成這樣的衛生紙給我
真的有夠好笑
很像上廁所上到一半
請隔壁阿姨支援衛生紙會拿到的一樣…
也是五星級的傻眼
不用這樣省吧！
（對了房務清潔完沒關燈還是我們回房間之後自己關的）

Check out的時候剛好是同一個女前台經理
詢問她 為什麼噪音的問題沒有任何後續？
她說 他們也檢查了就也沒辦法怎樣
接著問她昨天請他們來看發霉的水果呢？
她還順著我們的話說那水果就是送來安撫我們的，因為他們也不能怎樣
根本就不是欸！
水果是第一天就有的，第二天發現發霉的
第二天是房務來收走水果，根本就沒有再送水果來
房務記錄亂七八糟
還要客人來幫她搞清楚先後順序
從頭到尾一句抱歉都沒有還想質疑客人？

最後離開前在櫃檯發飆完
還站在門口等車時
前台女經理馬上跟那位悠閒吃早餐男主管回報
然後就沒有然後
那個男主管樣子真的是越看越火大🔥

Btw
Spa我們也去了
那邊的廁所有夠髒
還以為是公園的公廁
Spa很貴但是超級普
不用先預約
櫃臺會叫你直接到四樓
後來跟按摩姐姐聊天才知道
他們的spa一天大概只有1-2個客人
Google評論舒服都是假的喔😃
姊姊們有些也是外面進來支援的

🔥以下就是我的總結🔥
The Watson premium飯店管理爛死了
用五星級這三個字招搖撞騙
服務態度超級不專業
（唯一服務好的可能只有門口開門跟拿行李的）
不值得這個錢！！！
同樣價錢一定可以住到更好的選擇
這間no no no no no

review.comment_negative:
- we felt quite targeted by the behaviour of other guests. At breakfast and on the elevator we have been pushed and shoved and when waiting, people would get there after us and walk in the lift in front of us causing us to have to wait on the next one. The Same thing at the pool, someone stood on my shoes and then stood right at our pool bed taking pictures for nearly 10 minutes. Others were taking pictures which made us uncomfortable as we were clearly in them whilst in the pool. It was also filled with children and parents not controlling them.
Guests were playing music loudly, and pressing the door bells, and also would be shouting in the corridor at 7am. This kind of behaviour is unfortunately really disappointing and puts a downer on things. We understand it was a holiday, however this isn’t an excuse.
- the local area was not somewhere I’d recommend. Having been travelling now for over 5 months, it’s the first place we felt unsafe with the comments and behaviours of men when walking down the street.
- breakfast was really cold, and a particular staff member looked miserable every morning.
- the pool in the afternoon was as ridiculously busy and people would splash us when sitting on our seats
- we were a bit disappointed before arriving after being offered carnival tickets to then be told there wasn’t enough. After being offered,  we organised our transfer to be here on time and then we’re told there’s none left. This was a bit of a shame, especially when they said they’d organise something else for us and didn’t.
- one morning we asked for a towel at the pool to be told “maybe later”. There were sweat stains on the bed so we didn’t want to wait till later as there was only 1 other person at the pool. When we asked reception they said to go to the room and wait on one, no one came so we just took our bath towels up and we’re then given one 20 minutes later. This isn’t really 5 star standard or reaction to guests.

review.comment_positive: The room was nice and staff were helpful.
review.comment_negative:
The infinity pool was far too small for the hotel. It was full of kids and we tried to go in once but we’re constantly stared at by the kids.  There were no pool towels available (which you’d expect at a 5 star).  The bar on 25th floor didn’t have hot coffee, and I asked for a vodka and coke, told they did not have it and I would have to order the vodka and coke separately.. 
The view from the 23rd floor was nice but there were no chairs on the balcony. It said there was a shower but it was tap height as in you couldn’t stand under it. 
The breakfast was okay but the tables were still full of plates and the lady doing fresh eggs was rude on the first day. 
It was not a 5 star hotel with the service and facilities, and I wouldn’t go back.

review.comment_positive:
L'hôtel est très moderne et très propre. La chambre avait une vue magnifique sur la baie et elle était très grande. 
A moins de 10mn du port il est facile de réserver ses transports et de se déplacer.
review.comment_negative:
La quartier est très moyen. rien de particulièrement intéressant.  même la restauration alentour est très moyenne. 
Rien à faire à pied donc. 
Le in room dining n'est pas du tout au niveau d'un 5 étoiles. Et il n'y a pas de buffet pour les midis et les dîners. 
Le petit déjeuner est correct mais reste en dessous d'un standard pour un 5 étoiles. 
Très surprenant : les smart TV n'ont accès à aucune application ni Netflix ni Amazon Prime ni aucune autre plate-forme. Seul YouTube est accessible. Vraiment surprenant pour un hôtel d'un an seulement.

Even the receptionist can’t speak good English. It was so difficult to ask or communicate if you was there without a Vietnamese company. Check in and check out is so slowwwww, because they are doing it in the same time and people just jump over your turn .Unorganized system I’ve ever seen . I booked 5 rooms via booking.com but some of my friends couldn’t make it so I wrote to them if there is any solution for me , OR  I will pay for the first night and even extra if needed to cancel 1 room but there was no response from them …How helpful ??? 🤔
Breakfast was not appealing at all , needed ask 3 time just for hot water ….
Does not matter if we put on the sign: DO NOT DISTURB, they’re still knocked my door 2 times in 3 days because they wanted to get in to clean the room 😠

review.rating: Perfect Hotel for some Nights in Ha Long Bay
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Có Ban Công Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Really the best hotel we have ever slept in. 
The staff is very friendly and really helpful. 
The rooms are also very well furnished, especially the bathroom, we were on the 21st floor and the view of the city while showering was really a special experience.
The highlight of the whole hotel was of course the infinity pool on the 25th floor, really fantastic, there was a huge selection of cocktails, coffee, smoothies and other drinks and also a few snacks such as fries, all very good portions.
I would especially like to thank the receptionists Hieu and Hoa, very courteous and extremely nice and helpful people with very good knowledge of English.
Thank you for this special stay.

review.rating: Stunning Hotel, Exceptional Staff and Service, Beautiful Rooms, Fabulous Pools, Views to Die For.
review.room_type: The Watson Diamond Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: What a fabulous hotel. It was a last minute decision to stay here, as our Ha Long Bay boat cruise was cancelled due to weather warnings. Everything here was perfect. The staff were absolutely amazing. So friendly and helpful. All of them. Just a special mention for the wonderful Quet, who was working upstairs around the pool. So diligent, so accommodating and just a delightful guy. Also, big thanks to the lovely lady at reception, who contacted the driver who took us to the airport, and got my laptop back (that I left in his car) in time to make our flight.  The Pool is sensational, the views out of this world, and the room was first class. None of our photos could capture the absolute beauty of the ocean/bay vistas. Nespresso machine with pods, everything you could want.  We took an ocean view suite, and it was magnificent. Drinks were terrific - and not as expensive as other 5 star hotels. Food in the restaurant was also very good, and inexpensive compared to others. Oh yes, we would stay here again in a heartbeat. It's about a 10 or 15 minute drive to the main hub of Ha Long Bay, but we were very happy to be a little away from the super busy port area.

review.rating: Nice, new hotel and very helpful staff
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Có Ban Công Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is new, yet it starts getting bigger damages already. The room was big with a lot of space and it was clean. We only stayed 4 nights in the hotel which was enough. The breakfast was good but for a longer stay it won`t change much and can get boring. The brekafast buffet is big but no variation from day to day.
The staff is very friendly and we got a free late-check-out at 16.00 as our flight was late. This was no problem for the hotel.
The pool on top is nice but has already some damages. During the day we had it for us only and could really enjoy it.
Very helpful with trips and transportation and also good recomnadation of restaurants by the hotel.
review.comment_negative: About the hotel we can not complain. About our neigbours we can complain very hard. In the night they celebrated on the aisle and opened several doors of their rooms. They are all secured with an alarm which went off several times and was annoying during the night. As we informed the fromt desk, they have send security and the problem got solved very fast, thanks to the hotel.
